articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Wildfires in Turkey kill six, force tourists to flee by sea as blazes approach towns - ABC News
articles.description: About 100 Russian tourists are evacuated from Bodrum and people in Italy escape in dinghies as fires rage across southern Europe.
articles.content:
Panicked tourists in Turkey have hurried to rescue boats after being told to evacuate some hotels in the Aegean Sea resort town of Bodrum due to nearby wildfires.
